website_summaries.verdict: By far the best deal on pure coconut oil available. You get a large amount for a low price that other brands can't beat.
pros: High-quality coconut oil at a bargain price
cons: Has a strong smell and flavor of coconut, though some consumers might find this appealing

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent coconut oil..
customer_reviews.text: But Highway robbery! Sorry but I need to do this This is a good quality coconut oil, but I can't stand the inconsistent pricing. I'm on subscribe and save if I don't keep checking I will end up getting ripped off unknowingly. One month it's $14 to $15 then the next time it goes up to $30!!! You can buy this oil for approximately $15 range at Vitacost,com, Walmart.com, Jet.com, even Carrington Farms direct sell this for $19. Just thought you should know because this is so unethical.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: This saved my Rottweiler's life.
customer_reviews.text: This is great, and I will be getting more. My Rottweiler was losing her hair and scratching till she was raw nothing was working till I tried the product and now her hair has almost all grown back.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Price nearly DOUBLED??
customer_reviews.text: Dramatic price increase caught us unaware with Subscribe & Save. LOVE this product, but do not feel it is fair to suddenly DOUBLE the price :(
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Rebecca Laird

customer_reviews.title: Great For Old People
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my skin in the winter because I'm an old man and have dry skin. This stuff smells different too and I don't have that "'old people" smell. It keeps my elbows and knees and feet in great shape and I put a little on my face to make sure I stay handsome. People will say I look good in the casket. You know how they always say things like good and bad looking down.
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: This last jar I ordered had a chemical like after taste Very different from the Coconut flavor and smell that previous orders h.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product several times in the past and have been very satisfied. I like to put it in my coffee in the morning. This last jar I ordered tasted very different. Instead of a nice coconut flavor and smell, there was a strange chemical like aftertaste. I used it for several days but it is just not right. I bought another brand locally (Extra Virgin, Cold Pressed, Unrefined) and it had the coconut flavor and smell I was used to. I am very disappointed. I would like to know what could have gone wrong with it to make it taste this way.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Rancid Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long term customer of Carrington Farms virgin coconut oil. The one I recently received is rancid. I contacted Carrington Farms and received no reply. So I contacted Amazon, and they kindly gave me a refund. However I made 3 dozen muffins as well as some oatmeal bars with it, and had to throw all of that away, so lost lots of money on expensive ingredients. Looking at all the recent reviews, many others are having this problem. Carrington Farms has lost a long time customer. They should be monitoring reviews, and reacting proactively when customers have problems with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: received this product sold AFTER the best by date
customer_reviews.text: ordered 02SEP2016 and the "best by" date on the jar is 06/2016. I realize that doesn't mean it expires on that date, but I'd still have expected a product that wasn't already 3 months past the best by date.
customer_reviews.author: tvlgds

customer_reviews.title: Something is different . . . .
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering & recommending this brand for about 2 years but something is different & not in a good way. I noticed the label change but it seemed to be the same except for saying, " Gluten Free". Now I wonder if that is the problem? It has a different look & is flavorless, though the ones I have had previously are very mild, There was a satisfying, subtle taste. I have it only 3stars because of my disappointment but if it is the "Gluten free" that is the problem, I hope someone will speak up.
customer_reviews.author: MsPat

customer_reviews.title: Good Coconut oil......However
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying Carrington Coconut oil and may be my last. I usually buy a 32 oz. jar (Nature's Way), but their price has gone up so I went with Carrington...an excellent price. Have only used once and it appears to be a good oil. HOWEVER, this jar should have a pull tab on top so one could open it easily. I had to poke a hole in the paper cardboard with a nut-cracker pick and then tear piece by piece to get the seal off, thus getting my fingers all yukky with the oil. I would have rated it 4 or 5 stars had it not been for the HOWEVER!!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: EXTRA virgin switched on me? What? I have the original labels in videos.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say. I found the label I used to see for my cold pressed extra virgin coconut oil. I don't know when it was switched, but I just reordered it over and over. I finally noticed that they switched it on me. It is VIRGIN not extra virgin and all of my orders have been switched.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not at current price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but due to the recent price increase within the past few months (60%+) can't recommend buying it. The product itself is great for cooking and moisturizing. I paid $16.99 in January. Until the price drops back into that ballpark I will look for options. Very unfortunate as I've been using this product for years.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Why are the expiration dates missing?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received three CARRINGTON Farms organic extra Virgin coconut oil. One has the lid/cap broken and two of the three have the expiration date erased. I am enclosing the pictures. Unfortunately, I can not give these as gifts, which is what I planned to do. I am not sure what to think. Are these expired products?. Why are part of the expiration dates missing?.
customer_reviews.author: MIT

customer_reviews.title: Use this as a hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I use this to treat really painful eczema. I had tried all manner of over the counter creams with no luck. I used prescription creams, foams and steroids. Nothing. Coconut oil provided almost immediate relief. Since then I have used it every day and my eczema is under control with flareups being far less often, far less painful and far shorter. Im not a doctor and I don't have any medical proof to support this but I know what I feel. Before it was pain, now it isnt.
customer_reviews.author: ksuwildkat

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product BE AWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I have been almost monthly for 4 years or so. It is rotten and tasting it made me want to vomit for hours. I ordered a replacement and the smell is just as bad. There is a serious problem somewhere in your system and this product should be recalled immediately. There are no lot numbers or anything that distinguish when or where it was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: So versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use this for just about every use possible and love it! My pets do too! I use it for my dog’s silky coat and for teeth brushing ( please consult your vet before using! My dog loves coconut and isn’t allergic etc but it’s always good to get your vets advice when pertaining to your pets!) I use it for conditioner and stubborn makeup remover! I’ve had it take off full face and neck heavy cosplay makeup! So that’s saying something! But I have very dry skin, I know some people with oily skin have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Fi

customer_reviews.title: hit, hit, miss
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 2x and was very happy with the quality. My 3rd order arrived today and it was rancid with a foul odor that smelled like spoiled dairy. The coconut oil had a yellow tint, was clumpy and something was definitely wrong despite the jar having been properly sealed. Really enjoyed my first two purchases, but have ordered a new brand to avoid the risk. If you are reordering Carrington Farms Organic Coconut Oil, make sure you order before you run out so you can test and return the new jar if it arrives spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: AnyAisles

customer_reviews.title: Delicious - My FAVORITE !!
customer_reviews.text: I've gagged on a lot of foul coconut oils before I found this absolutely delicious product! It's perfect! If your coconut oil isn't tasty, don't use it - and unforch; a lot of companies, even trusted big brands, sell rancid coconut oil. If you don't use coconut oil as your moisturizer, then at least use it as your makeup remover. It does beautiful things to our skin because we evolved with oils such as this, not petroleum products and synthetics. I've used this brand for years and my skin looks great - I feed it to my puppy and her skin and hair is smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Annie C

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, So Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased this coconut oil several times now. It is a great value compared to any grocery store. It is high quality which means we can use it for anything: -cooking, baking, frying -as a moisturizer for my face -to prevent razer burn after shaving -we also keep some in a GoToob to squirt on toilet paper instead of using diaper wipes on our baby. He is super susceptible to rash and this gets the mess off without overdrying and irritating his bum. There are infinate uses for high quality coconut oil!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil *BUT*
customer_reviews.text: Love the Oil BUT UNFORTUNATELY our last container wasn't filled all the way as usual. The other down side is that we get it through subscribe and save, and didn't find out about the shortage till the return window was closed BUMMER. Maybe we need to find a new oil. It was used for multiple different uses, most recently oil pulling every day the taste and texture have been fine and its been great for our skin too. We are going to try the Natures Way brand now which has good reviews and a better price too. We'll see if their quality and Quantity (full containers) measures up.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Healthy/Used In Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coconut oil as a recommendation from my doctor. He mentioned that if I put one or two tablespoons in my morning smoothie, it will help ensure overall health. It does taste very oil with some coconut flavor. He mentioned that he knows a few people that freeze it into small ice cubes and suck on them. Yuck. For the price and the health benefits, this was an easy decision. The 54-ounce container is the best bang for your buck. Also: Coconut oil sticks to your blender and your glass, so thorough cleaning is required.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Taste is very decent as well as cleanlinest. Have had no problem with this product at all. I need to buy more, but may try Costco brand due to cost here on Amazon. Lately, the cost has been see-sawing between $20 - $26 a bottle almost daily! Not sure what's going on. UPDATE>>> Tried Costco brand and am sticking with it. Taste and attributes about the same. Many reviewers say Costco CO isn't that good but I don't see it that way. Give it a try and decide for yourself. Unfortunate for Carrington, their price jumping around for months on end has lost them a custormer!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coconut oil---this is my third container. I use it for dry skin, on my hair, added to oatmeal, and to cook with; it is also helpful for my cats' irritated skin, to treat hair balls (just put a little on a paw--they lick it off) and to make their coats shiny. It has the most wonderful smell but doesn't infuse foods with it while cooking. The oil stays smooth, doesn't get grainy after awhile, it's easy to access at the bottom of the container, & the price is great. Can't recommend this brand enough. (For those not familiar with coconut oil, don't be put off that it's solid---it melts at body temp).
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Durant

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this coconut oil from Carrington Farms! Now, I go through coconut oil quickly...I cook and bake with it daily. I also make a number of homemade products with it, such as body scrub, body lition, eye makeup remover, and under-eye cream. I'm constantly making and baking stuff for others and often proudly boast about how much coconut oil is in those items. So with that much use, this doesn't last a month in my kitchen. However, for the price, it is a great product and I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great price but an off-setting scent and taste
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems OK with it texture and color-wise, but the scent and taste isn't as good as other virgin coconut oils. I can't put my finger on it, but it's either on the verge of being old, or perhaps it's an expeller press issue. It's not as though it's too strong of a coconut scent/taste (I like a strong coconut flavor), and I don't think it's rancid, but possibly on the verge... I don't quite know for sure, but unfortunately I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a spoiled jar of this coconut oil. When it arrived, it appeared it all melted before I received it, because the coconut was laying on its side in the jar. It tasted and smelled rancid. This was my second jar purchased. I will not be purchasing this again. I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Just a customer

customer_reviews.title: very mild coconut flavor..not over-powering
customer_reviews.text: We are repeat users of this product. It has perfect texture, taste, and scent. It's especially great to add (a generous amount) in the final stages of making oatmeal...the hearty version...and also add raisins to soften at that point. Add cinnamon and brake up some walnuts to add in the bowl...and sometimes a little honey on top. This coconut oil really adds a nice creamy moisture to the oatmeal. It also works well in heating up black beans with a little salt. Yum! It works well with so many foods.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Date is invisible!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I agree with several other reviewers. My husband and I have looked with magnifiers for an expiration date ... none. That bothers us as we share with our 3 dogs, 2 cats and even our 2 parrots lick a bit. For an large jar ... it is sad that we have to pitch because we can't figure out if it is safe or not. Going with Nature's Way or Viva next time.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Ross, MA

customer_reviews.title: excited about this product
customer_reviews.text: i used this coconut oil only once so far cause i got it today, the first thing i did was put it in my hair for about an hour then washed like i usually would. i also added some at the ends of my hair and blow dried. the dye in my hair has left my hair feeling a bit course so i'm hoping this will help. nothing so far on the texture but it's helped with frizz and a bit of shine :)
customer_reviews.author: nini_24

customer_reviews.title: Not a full 54 ounces!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing Carrington Farms Coconut Oil. I switched from another brand because of inconsistent weights. So I naturally weighed this jar and as you can see from the before and after photos, this brand was exactly 2 ounces short. Actual product only weighed 52oz. not 54oz. as stated on the container. I will not purchase Carrington Farms again. I’ll keep looking for an honest brand.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina S

customer_reviews.title: Will always be in stock
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using coconut oil for over 20 years in various ways. Every day I start out with coffee with coconut oil , raw sugar, half n half. I use it in my henna mix for hair to condition and baking. The coconut oil and the Laurcidin pellets are anti viral and anti bacterial it works via the Monolaurin in it. I haven’t had a cold, flu in years, if I’m not feeling good I take scoop of pellets, it’s helped me and with this virus I think. Helps immune system, I’ll keep taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda :)

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands of unrefined coconut oil. Carrington Farms has become my favorite! I give my dogs 2TBS daily in their dry food (I have 5 Labs and temporarily fostering 2 more), the 2 fosters had itchy, dry skin (some bald spots), and dull fur, swollen ears and runny eyes. I have been putting Carrington Farms Organic Coconut oil in there dry food daily and WOW! They are looking and feeling sooooo good. I also make lip balm, savves, lotions, use it with my YL oils and so much more. Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LaHuis

customer_reviews.title: Love Carrington Farms Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: "Now nearly forty eight years old, Unlined skin looks much lovelier Than blemished past could have foretold." Into adulthood I had both acne and dark spots on my face. After decades of expensive treatments I learned that store-bought and even dermatologist recommended sunscreens were causing my skin issues. Now I use coconut oil as sunscreen and look better than I did even as a teenager. Also use coconut oil for my cat's dry skin, for brushing my teeth, with food, and for many other purposes. I love Carrington Farms and really appreciate their prices.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: boxers love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this coconut oil. I can't say that i use it for cooking because I'm not much of a.cook😥 🐩🐩🐕 however I am a dog lover and live with three wonderful boxer boys who all shed like crazy. Within a week of getting this oil on their food every morning the shedding has reduced by two thirds. They turn their nose up to.the food that doesn't have this coconut oil on it! They love it, so I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: social work lady

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son actually bought a small tub from a local store to cook with. I read up on it and decided to try it to soften and moisturize my skin. I've tried tons of lotions and oils, TONS. This is excellent stuff!! I used it like lotion for my body. After every shower or bath I put it on before I dry myself, I let it soak in for a couple minutes and then finish my after shower/bath ritual as usual. It is oily feeling until you dry. The scent is amazing!! But it's not to strong, you're not going to smell like a coconut all day long, lol. I absolutely LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Khrino

customer_reviews.title: ALL AROUND GREAT OIL!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience buying pure organic coconut oil and I must say that this did not disappoint. The aroma is heavenly! It smells just like you cracked open a fresh coconut. It arrives in solid form, (almost like a whipped consistency), but obviously melts in warmer temperatures. I have cooked with it and have also added it to hot Moringa tea. I primarily ordered this for pulling but it is also great when used as a carrier oil for any type of homemade or store bought moisturizing cream or butter. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Pure, amazing smell- This oil is my go to!
customer_reviews.text: I use this coconut oil for many things: Cooking, making lotions, hair conditioners, and oil pulling. I use it to dilute essential oils when making vapor rub for my children. I've ordered this many times and have come to rely on this brand. If they run out of it in the store, I order it online and would rather wait then buy another oil. It does melt in the summer, but I have never had a problem with rancidity, and consider the melting as a sign of its purity. I highly recommend Carrington Farms!
customer_reviews.author: prerequisite

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Taste & Smell of Coconuts!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 10-star product but I am only given 5 stars to use. I had no idea just how good Coconut Oil could taste and smell! What a wonderful product. Previously I had purchased 100% Pure, Non-Hydrogenated but it annoyed me that there was no nice coconut smell or taste. Carrington Farms Unrefined, Cold Pressed, 100% Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil has restored my faith in Coconut! Don't be afraid to try this wonderful Coconut Oil - unless you don't want to taste and smell coconut. I Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: love my pets

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product however I do not like the fact that Amazon has it posted at $35.00 when you can go to the official Carrington Farms site and purchase the exact same thing for 19.99. I had been ordering from Amazon cuz it was just a click and quick delivery but that price difference is ridiculous! I don't know exactly what made me check their site but I am glad I did. The Coconut oil itself is wonderful! I love the product and use it everyday. Wonderful and I appreciate that it is certified Organic with no Hexane and is cold pressed. High quality. I will continue to purchase but not for $35.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste Rancid And Not The Old Formula
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time buying this product but the quality of the product is not the same. It taste rancid like it was expired so I checked the date and that wasn't the issue. It was the most awful organic extra virgin coconut oil I've ever tasted that I had to contact Amazon and they were kind enough to offer a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dali_Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Moldy after just a week
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for nearly 2 years and had no complaints until now. This last container that I received Oct 30th started to grow mold with in the first week. I have never had any of the other containers of this same coconut oil ever grow mold and I had one container for nearly 4 months once. I don't understand why this one is moldy :(
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Rancid odor
customer_reviews.text: There is something wrong here. I bought it one time and it was great tasting, then three times now it’s been rancid. One time it was replaced by amazon with oil that smelled like coconut and I used that, but when I reordered it again, hoping for the best, I opened the sealed container and it smelled really rancid and bad. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: city gal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this coconut oil. Maybe I got a bad batch, but it has a soapy, "chemically" after taste. My wife doesn't taste it, but -- as she says -- I eat a lot more coconut oil than she does. I'm a little concerned about eating it, but we just spent more than an hour making triple batches of coconut fig balls (from Autoimmune Paleo Cookbook, trescott). Really wanted to like this since I could set it up on subscribe and save. The two that I have found taste best are Wilderness Family and Tropical Traditions.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great price, wonderful coconut oil with many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great! I don't really notice a difference between all the brands that sell unrefined coconut oil, but we've always been happy with Carrington Farms. It's one of the cheapest, comes in a nice big size, and has always served us well. We'll keep buying until something with same quality gets cheaper! Bring on the entrants! Coconut oils and Avocados are on the rise! We use coconut oil in just about everything. It's a magical oil and extremely good for you too. Great for cooking, baking, snacks, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very good coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried this brand. I usually order my coconut goodies from Tropical Traditions which I consider the best source for coconut oil and cream. I bought this because I needed it quickly and my Amazon prime could get it here in two days. So I was pleasantly surprised to find that I could not tell the difference from my Tropical Traditions oil and this new oil. It's great! I really love it and use it for so many purposes from cooking, baking, beauty products, etc. Can't be without it! So I give a 10 out of 10 for the quality of this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Wednesday shopper

customer_reviews.title: Price is too high and not consistent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent coconut oil. However, the price has gone up substantially. This is a quick way to lose a loyal customer. I am not happy that the price is no longer reasonable. I've been purchasing this coconut oil regularly for a couple years for about $16. I just bought this in Jan of this year nd it was around $16. It used to be even cheaper. Now it is almost $30 bucks! I just want a good and pure jar of coconut oil at a reasonable price that is consitent.
customer_reviews.author: M.ray gilliard

customer_reviews.title: It's the only thing i use anymore
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. It is virgin, Organic, unrefined, cold-pressed, no Hexane. I use this coconut oil as my main oil for sautéing, frying and even in biscuits. It's very good in hot chocolate for added creaminess. Health-wise, it supports beautiful skin and hair, increases your metabolism and curbs appetite. I prefer it over Olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: kmcb

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Coconut Oil Has so Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a coconut oil that was not too expensive and came across this huge tub. I’ve split it with my mom and we’re a Kiki girl great use out of it. I use this as a both lotion, makeup remover, in my hair, and for cooking. It’s solid, because it’s winter now, but melts pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A

customer_reviews.title: I am a cook so I know coconuts One out of every three you crack open is grey and slimy on the inside accompanied with a putrid r
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is going back!! I hoped it would be a fresh coconut aroma when I twisted off the top. To my relief the fresh aroma of coconuts hit me in both nostrils! That was a short lived experience five minutes later I took another sniff and BOOM no more coconut smell!! I am a cook so I know coconuts One out of every three you crack open is grey and slimy on the inside accompanied with a putrid rotten smell so who's to say some of theses didn't get mixed in with the good ones? Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: winston wilbert

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand to order because I get a HUGE amount for a very reasonable price and it smells--and tastes!--delicious. Nice big tub of unrefined coconut oil that doesn't cost me an arm and a leg, so I can use it for everything from cooking and baking to homemade body products. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pegasene

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Oil
customer_reviews.text: Unrefined-Organic coconut oil is the way to go. This coconut oil is so smooth and it smells really nice. The main reason we like it is because of the products we've used before and the research we have done. We mainly use this for baking, cooking and in smoothies. No need to refrigerate it, just keep it in a cool and dry place.
customer_reviews.author: Trading Robot

customer_reviews.title: The newest version of the formerly exquisite, highlight-of-my-day coconut ...
customer_reviews.text: The newest version of the formerly exquisite, highlight-of-my-day coconut oil "manufactured" by Carrington Farms has a different label and an icky consistency, which makes me wonder about their claims of being "organic" and "extra virgin," either now or previously. I won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Brand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coconut oil. It's cold pressed so it doesn't have that burned taste that I've experienced with another brand that I used. The price is great too. I've purchased this 3 times already and plan to purchase it again. I use coconut oil mostly for cooking and oil pulling. I also use it on occasion as a lip balm, facial moisturizer, and on my hair. Update 11/30/18: This is the second consecutive purchase where the oil was leaking from the container. It seems the aluminum seal was defective both times. If this happens again, I will have to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brook607

customer_reviews.title: Great product / Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: We have been using so much coconut oil around our house that the small jars from the grocery store were getting very expensive. I found the Carrington Farms Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil and I couldn't believe how much you got for such a great value. What surprised me even more was the quality. The coconut oil was very superior to what I had been using. The flavor was great, but the oil also has such a smooth consistency. You can't beat this value. This is definitely the only oil I plan to order from now on. The only thing that would make it perfect is if it came in a glass jar as opposed to the plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Z

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs & I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I have four dogs! Two of them have skin problems so I decided to do some research and I found out if you put this in their food it really seems to help with all of the itching. They definitely love it over their food so if you have a picky eater this may help. I also noticed that it makes their coats are nice and shiny. I also use it to cook with and apply it to my hair. So it's a win win for the whole household.
customer_reviews.author: T L Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: It's a pure & as good as it gets for service & product quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pure & as good as it gets for service & product quality! Yeah, it's "Saturated" fat...but don't let that crap-science misnomer keep you from some heart & artery healthy oil. It's more of a life-style issue really, not a single "Food" or food-byte issue. I use this as the "Fat" of choice for my Coffee-Creamer recipe. "Fat" brings "Satiety" which makes you feel like you've actually had something good to eat...which makes you feel a sense of fullness & leads to normal indulgence in-lieu of over-indulgence. Come on people!! EDUCATE yourself!! You think slain & sacrificed Animal Fat "Lard" is the golden goose of fat to eat in your taco's & burritos & other supposed interned food-stuffs??!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Michel Gerarrd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coconut oil (great for dogs and cats too)
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using coconut oil. But it's amazing! I use it as: 1. Moisturizer for my face, hands, elbows, knees and feet 2. Makeup remover 3. Mouthwash before brushing my teeth to kill bacteria that toothpaste can't 4. Dietary supplement for myself and for my dogs (they love the taste and come begging every time I open the jar! I'd give it to my cats too but they aren't interested) 5. Shaving cream 6. Aftershave to reduce red bumps 7. Deodorant for times I'm not going out (it doesn't deodorize quite as much as store-bought deodorant but is a much healthier alternative) 8. Cooking as an alternative to butter and oils
customer_reviews.author: Isabel M.

customer_reviews.title: The best coconut oil ever!
customer_reviews.text: There are many coconut oil products on the market today. The Carrington Farms pure, unrefined, cold pressed, 100% Extra Virgin Coconut oil is the best by far. From the taste to the healing qualities of this amazing product there is no better coconut oil. I also use it with a teaspoon of butter in my coffee instead of cream every morning. Just prepare your coffee (add sugar or not) and the oil and butter and put the mixture in the Magic Bullet for 10 seconds and the coffee is like a latte' with a foamy head. All three of my daughters use it on their hair (they are teenagers) and they swear by the results.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Arthur C. Groves III

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: Im so sad this is out if stock right now i need more! I have spent a good amount of money in the past on coconut oil because infind myself using it more and more. This brand is such a good value for price/size for organic, unrefined, cold pressed... ehich is usually way more expensive. This is pure good stuff! I use it for mostly all my cooking needs now for health, i replaced all my body/face lotions, use it in homemade deoderant, and i even use it on my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the only coconut Oil I buy. I like that it is cold pressed and organic. You can buy this tub at cosco but then you'd also have to have a cosco membership, which I do not. The taste isn't too cono-nutty. I do separate smaller quantities into containers that I use for different purposes so I do not contaminate the large container. The health benefits and overall daily useage is astounding. I do however, like everyone else, caution to not put this down any drains as it will solidify and cause clogging.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with this package
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this multiple times with no issues, but the outside packaging of this container smells strongly of essential oils. The inside smells normal, like coconut oil...but I had purchased this to feed to my dog and with it smelling like it does I don’t know if I feel it’s safe enough for him to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good value for large size
customer_reviews.text: I started out using another brand a couple of years ago, but this large size of Carrington Farms brand was cheaper overall. I gave it a try, looking for flaws that would explain the cheaper price. I couldn't find any. This stays softer than the other brand - does that mean anything? Lower fat content perhaps, or just a different type of coconut? It cooks the same, tastes the same, smells the same. And the softness makes it easier to use in the wintertime in my cold house. I had to "chop" chunks out of the other one in winter, not that I minded. Just illustrating the difference in density.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeyar

customer_reviews.title: Strange flavour
customer_reviews.text: I have used coconut oil since childhood (refined, unrefined etc) and am very familiar with the rich flavour of fresh oil and the smell of stale oil. This oil's flavour and smell and something so strange and unfamiliar, makes me wonder what is really in it? Is it even coconut oil? or stale coconut oil mixed with some other oil?
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Very good taste. Better for your health than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: Always get extra virgin organic coconut oil. Very long shelf life. Very good taste. Better for your health than any other oils. Coconut oil has many health benefits. For clearer sinuses you can put a little on your finger and put it up your nose. Works in as little as twenty minutes. Dr Bruce Fife has many great books I recommend you add to your reading list. Coconut oil can strengthen your immune system and Destroy viruses. Dr Fife suggests three Tbsp a day for optimum benefit. You will feel better and more energetic when you do. Coconut oil can increase your metabolism for twenty four hours after you consume at least a Tbsp.
customer_reviews.author: Cee DeLoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for such a large amount.
customer_reviews.text: So many uses. Helped me get relief from swollen gums while waiting for dentist appointment and still waiting to get teeth pulled. It is great for softening skin. It goes on like baby oil but after a few minutes drys leaving a silky coating but not sticky or oily. Also good for my pets both on skin and internally. It has bacterial healing and is good to eat a couple tablespoons daily for humans too.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was doing research on the numerous benefits of coconut oil and decided to give it a try. I'm hooked. It arrived in liquid form because it's summer here on the east coast. I placed the container in the refrigerator and its pure white solid now. I heat up a spoon to take out what I need. The taste is not overpowering in the least. Little by little I will convert everything from cooking, spreads as replacement for butter and regular consumption to coconut oil. 100% organic, gluten free, non-GMO, free of hydrogenated and trans fats, Kosher, organic and Product of the Philippines. Container is BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: Islanders Man

customer_reviews.title: Best you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coconut oil! I have tried many different kinds but this is the very best. It’s the only kind I will use. The flavor is wonderful and it smells awesome. I cook nearly everything with coconut oil so I want it to be the highest quality and best tasting! This one takes the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Better price than others, not as fragrant
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal compared to the organic coconut oil I was buying from another site. It's not quite as fragrant as the other brand, but it does smell like coconut. Because this is a large container, I use the jar from the used up other brand on my counter and put the rest in the fridge to keep it fresh. For most uses, I use this due to cost and it still being organic. For things I want to have a stronger (heavenly) coconut scent, I use the other kind. If my budget were tighter, I would only use this. The only difference I can note is how strong the scent is.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomHikerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Rancid and gritty, twice!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this twice and both times it was gritty and strange tasting. It is dangerously old or has been mishandled, and one jar was rancid. Just disgusting and definitely a food safety issue. I was refunded but I'm scared to order again as a I doubt Amazon has any quality control of its sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara M.

customer_reviews.title: My skin loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My skin is so soft! I have been using Coconut Oil for about 6 mths now. I use it as a body & facial moisturizer and I couldnt be happier. I have already converted quite a few friends & family members also. It has a faint smell that smells more like almonds than coconut to me, but it isnt bothersome at all. My husband loves to cuddle up to me and tell me how good my skin smells. I would definately recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: skimped on the product
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY disappointed that this product did NOT have 54 oz of coconut oil in it. The jar was only 2/3 full. When you first open the lid it appears to be filled to the top, but when you take off the top layer of oil (hard oil) there is a gaping hole right to the bottom of the jar. I am a soaper and use recipes that call for a certain amount of coconut oil, I only got 48.85 ounces out of the first jar, and the second jar I got 49.55 ounces. I will not purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Dee Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste and now unable to return
customer_reviews.text: I had purchase this coconut oil before and had been satisfied with the quality and taste of it.Also like that the company give back to their people.I ordered 2 jars the last time because I use it everyday and didn't want to run out of it .Unfortunately,when I open one of the jars noticed the consistency was different and the taste was horrible.I don't know what happen with this last 2 jars or when it happen but they were storage in the same conditions that my previous ones in air conditioning.Now I find out that I can't even return or exchange them.Very disappointed!! I am loosing a lot of money with this and not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin, hair, and cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it for cooking, but I do use it for skin moisturizer. It goes a long way, smells great, and absorbs fast, I like it because it is not some synthetic blend of chemicals like lotions. When lotion absorbs into your skin, you are getting chemicals. When you use coconut oil, you're getting just natural MCT and lauric acid which are great internally and externally on skin or hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alien Male

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I have heard good things about coconut oil for the last several years, but it wasn't until recently that I experienced the full benefits. I cook with it, put it on my skin, put it in my hair, use it as a personal lubricant, remove make-up with it, put it on infected hair folicals, I could go on and on! Carrington Farms coconut oil doesn't leave an oily residue on skin and the huge tub is convenient for the variety of things I am using it for! Love it! I am set up on subscribe and save to receive it every month!
customer_reviews.author: GypsyGal08

customer_reviews.title: Use coconut oil for so many things.
customer_reviews.text: I use coconut oil for sauteing and occasionally I will use it while making my whipped body butters and hair products. Carrington Farms extra virgin is not only organic but also cold pressed and unrefined. It has a nice fresh smell. Everything you would want. I like the larger container. I keep a small amount in my own container for cooking and then refrigerate the rest until needed. Keeps it fresher longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: a big jug for a good price. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Quality and consistency I'm familiar with, a big jug for a good price. No complaints. Uses are endless- oil pulling, rub a small amount on legs for the summer or all over to moisturize after the shower, my dog loves it and it's great for her- she will eat it alone or over food, also duh, in cooking and smoothies. I actually use it more for beauty and health needs than cooking because of the distinctive taste.
customer_reviews.author: beecave

customer_reviews.title: No expectation date and liquid
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet because it came in liquid form so I will give it a 3 star rating for now. It is 95 degrees in Texas so that's probably why it melted I popped it into the fridge so hopefully it will solidify. One complaint I have is that it looks like the expiration date was purposely rubbed off... ??? I'll post pics. Update** Works great for hair like I had hoped. It ended up thickening up after I put it in the fridge then pulled it out so it is a soft texture now. Smells like toasted coconuts.
customer_reviews.author: B.a.

customer_reviews.title: A large jar of delicious versatile organic extra virgin coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Versatile oil that is solid at room temperature. Useful in cooking and as a skin moisturizer, even useful as an antibacterial dental paste. This coconut oil has a definite coconut flavor. It is useful for higher temperature sauteing and I even add it to my smoothies to help with absorbing the nutrients in the greens. Note if your smoothie ingredients are frozen and you add the coconut oil it will from little balls due to the cold. This is a large jar of coconut oil and in my opinion well priced for the quantity of this organic extra virgin coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Health & beauty
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand of coconut oil my husband seems to prefer to use. He practices the no-poo shampoo method of baking soda & coconut oil. He uses this in his long curly hair & beard. He likes it because it turns soft or liquid without having to heat on the stove. He stores it in the bathroom & the laundry room. We haven't stored it in the kitchen, because I use a different brand of coconut oil for cooking purposes, as to not get confused & end up with hair in our food.
customer_reviews.author: SingleClutchMom

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again soon. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is awesome. In AZ, it's really hot here, and coconut oil is super slippery. Even with it being sealed and the lid was on tight, some of the oil leaked out, but just a very small amount. The oil is such a great price per ounce, and we went through ours in about 2 months, but I think we use a lot in our home, so it may go farther for you. It works out to 105 tbsp or 315 tsp. The quality seems every bit as good as others I have tried for virgin organic.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Received two spoiled jars
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company sent me a replacement, but this one was even worse throughout the whole jar. Yellowed and the texture is visibly off. It also smells horrible. Very disappointed Original Review: I’ve bought this product several times without issue, but the last one I received has already gone bad before it arrived. The image is of the bottom of the unopened jar. The black spec is also inside the jar. I requested a replacement, may change review after issue is resolved
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive and good coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coconut oil. It is so good, I use it for so many things. I use it for an eye makeup remover, I use it for after the shower moisturizer, and I put a TBS. In my morning cup of coffee. It is sooo yummy. This is a very good price also. For the same container at Wal-Mart it costs about $3 more. I enjoy saving my money. I ordered this yesterday and with my Amazon prime account, I did not have to pay for shipping and i received it today. Less than 24 hrs. After placing the order!!!
customer_reviews.author: Panda👄

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I ise this for lotion, mixed with essential oils. Essy to spread as lotion.
customer_reviews.author: ErinE

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a great product
customer_reviews.text: We use this oil for so many things. We use it as a skin moisturizer, add it to morning tea, for oral oil pulling, cooking, giving to our dogs as a healthy daily treat, and likely other uses I cannot think of at the moment. I think it’s a great quality virgin oil. I’ve tried a few other brands and like that this one is well priced but it also has a nice coconutty aroma and has always worked well. This one large tub probably lasts us 3-4 months. This is the third time we’ve ordered it. We seem to be using them up faster and faster because it’s so good. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great oil! Delicious in ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I can feel the difference when I don't have this organic coconut oil, but the price has REALLY gone up. This is definitely one of the better coconut oils, but the price has doubled. I'm so glad I didn't sign up for auto-ship bcuz you're stuck with the current price. I need coconut oil right NOW, but I refuse to pay $30. Its lots of competition and your wholesale stores have it for what I paid and less. This price takes the convenience of ordering from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shemariyah

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil is a daily used item in our home. Its used for hair treatments, diaper cream, cooking, art work etc. There's very little that we do that doesn't need it in some form or another. Coconut oil can be expensive depending on where you get it from. Considering how much we use I'm always looking to balance my money and the quality. This coconut oil is great quality and works wonders for its intended use. I'll definitely buy again after I run out!
customer_reviews.author: meagan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coconut oil brand!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite coconut oil brand! I have been using coconut oil for my skin and hair for over 5 years. Better and keeps longer than other brands such as Brad's Organic and generic grocery store oils. Smells fresh and amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: No flavors of a real organic coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I used to by this product through Costco, and it was a real Organic coconut oil at that time. But now Costco discontinued this product from their store, only available in Amazon and a few other supermarkets. I have bought one bottle of the coconut oil through Amazon, It has no real flavors or smell or quality of a real organic coconut oil, seems diluted with some other mineral oil like Paraffin. This is not what I expected or experienced before when used this product before, not sure what happened to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Adithya

customer_reviews.title: Worst shipment of organic coconut oil!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this product. I used coconut oil frequently on my skin. This one has little beads of coconuts that is just so irritating as I apply the oil to the skin and when mixing with other oils. Not a smooth application. I see the little beads, I feel them on my skin,,,yuk! Wish I could return this one. I will check and believe I have used this brand before and don's recall a problem, but this one....awful!~!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong unpleasant flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I won't buy this again. Should have tried a small container to see if I liked it. It has a very strong coconut flavor, with a slightly bitter aftertaste. I don't mind the coconut flavor, but I cook with it, put it in my coffee and this one is really over powering. I've used other brands that have a sweet after taste. I guess I'll be using this one for lotion. For the next 5 years! (Cuz it's a lot)
customer_reviews.author: mileen a gilkey

customer_reviews.title: I spread this coconut oil all over my body and this coconut oil makes my skin feel amazing. I often get irritated skin as I work ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not trying to paint any one a visual; however, I spread this coconut oil all over my body and this coconut oil makes my skin feel amazing. I often get irritated skin as I work in an environment where I have contact with many children and many different "things" are floating around. This coconut oil helps relieve and replenish my skin creating it to be smooth and rid any unwanted afflictions. I highly recommend this brand and will continue using it. Thank you as I am a completely satisfied Amazonian!
customer_reviews.author: Ryfizzle

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with this oil
customer_reviews.text: Strong coconut flavor which tells me it is less processed than most. I have been very happy with this oil. I use it for tons of my cooking and even making icing for cupcakes. There are a ton of allergies in my extended family so I started making an allergy friendly cupcake and a coconut icing and it is a huge hit. The cupcakes are just a box of spice cake and a large can of pumpkin mixed and baked. The icing is coconut oil, vanilla extract, and powered sugar... It is a total hit everytime I make it and this particular coconut oil is perfect for the recipe.
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: Their coats never looked better and it is a great
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy coconut oil in the stores in smaller jars and pay a lot more for it. Then when I started feeding it to our dogs as well, I needed a lot more of it and it got really expensive. So I researched to find a high quality, organic brand that was reasonably priced. This fits the bill on all counts. I order the large tub and scoop out some that I may need for myself and cooking and then keep the large tub in the dog room for feeding. Their coats never looked better and it is a great, economical product. I've reordered a couple of times now and am getting ready to do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Greysaver

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Organic Coconut Oil!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried numerous Organic Cocunut Oil's and we will only use this product moving forward! We use this for cooking, skin care, and hair care! The results are incredible. It works excellent as a moisturizer for skin and hair - and has so many positive benefits. We recommend it to all of our family and friends! It has also been wonderful for cooking - it has a nice light flavor. The texture is smooth and is easy to work with. The price is excellent for the amount you are getting! We always buy through Amazon, and as Prime Members it is at our doorstep in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Charming

customer_reviews.title: Yummy! Enough to share with all your friends:)
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a ridiculous amount of coconut deliciousness! The flavor is noticeable and fresh. Try it in basmati rice with a handful of minced onion tossed in the cooking pot. And don't be shy with the oil. Heavenly! I transferred mine to a green glass canning jar to block a little more light since I keep it on the counter by the stove. Put the whole jar in a pot of hot tap water BEFORE removing the foil seal, because the lid is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel MackintoshTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Qualitynatural health in a jar.
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat order. Love my coconut oil! (ONLY fresh, VIRGIN, COLD PRESSED!!!) Love the smell, love the taste! Good for your pets, especially dogs. Their skin will be less prone to allergic issues, rashes, hot spots. Their coats will become shiny, healthy, beautiful. So many health benefits. I make grilled cheeses with it, they're delicious! I know what to expect when I click the reorder button for Carrington Farms...quality. Love open my shipment and pull their jar out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: This is the best buy and I love the wide mouth jar
customer_reviews.text: omg. This is the best buy and I love the wide mouth jar. Easy to get out of container. Has a very nice smell and is not overpowering coconut, but I like coconut. This makes the best popcorn. I even use this on my dogs skin for dryness and my friend has been mixing this with baking soda and applying to his skin cancer and it seems to be helping keep the lesion from growing. 1 tsp of baking soda and 1 tsp of coconut oil and apply to skin. Kind of burns at first but his lesion appears to be getting better.
customer_reviews.author: kika44me

customer_reviews.title: Cooking, diaper cream... works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: Putting aside the price changes, I really like this coconut oil. On top of that, the container is BPA free. I use it for cooking, diluting essential oils, and also replaced diaper cream with coconut oil (applying it during each diaper change, no diaper rashes ever), works wonders. I first started purchasing Carrington Farm because Costco at one point carried it. But now they've got their own and it is more expensive. I really have no complaints whatsoever about it. The taste is great, everything is great, and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Great Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Carrington Farms Organic Cocont oil for a few years. We mainly use it for cooking and my husband adds it to his brewed coffee daily, we also made deodorant out of it. We’ve tried other coconut oils and Carrington Farms is the best. We have referred this to many friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Gail

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed. I bought this same product previously and loved it. This time, the coconut oil has a distinct and strong chemical smell and taste. I’ll have to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Hergert

customer_reviews.title: Awsome oil and killer price!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever!!! The size you get for the price here is the best way to go. We use this for our washable wipes for my son and it lasts about 4 months. Just mix this in a bowl of water and a good spoonful of this and your good to go. I have also used this as a cooking oil and it made my chicken delicious. I have used this as a lip balm and cuticle oil and its also been awsome. So versatile. Buy this one here because in the store this price gets you like 1/10 the size and its junk. I am now only using this brand, I trust it and have not been let down.
customer_reviews.author: sassy

product_meta.title: Carrington Farms Organic Virgin Coconut Oil, 54 oz. - Compare Our Cost Per Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Virgin Coconut Oil 54oz.Carrington Farms is a top coconut oil brand in the country. Our 54 oz. (ounce) organic, unrefined, cold pressed, virgin coconut oil comes from only the finest coconuts in the Philippines. Our organic coconut oil adheres to only the highest quality standards by passing all supplement grade testing, more than is needed for the food industry. With our friendly packaging and clean ingredients, Carrington Farms is a natural way to boost your day! Since 2000, Carrington Farms has been making delicious, 100% organic, non-genetically modified Health Food Products accessible to nutrition-conscious consumers around the United States. Our comprehensive line of grains, seeds, powders and oils including coconut oil serves a range of purposes, from conditioning hair and nails to cooking and adding a boost to your smoothies. From our sliced milled flax seed to our chia blends and cold-pressed organic virgin coconut oil, all of Carrington Farms’ vitamin and mineral-full food products are a great way to start adding a little more nutrition to your everyday life!. Use for skin or as a hair moisturizer, even apply it to bee stings and bug bites to soothe and heal wounds.
feature_bullets: AMAZING QUALITY - Carrington Farms 54 oz. (ounce) organic, unrefined, cold pressed, gluten free, virgin coconut oil starts with only the most pristine coconuts from the Philippines.
NUTRIENT DENSE - Every package of Carrington Farms is organic, unrefined, and cold pressed to preserve MCTs and other nutrients.

UNPARALLELED STANDARDS - Our coconut oil adheres to only the highest quality standards by passing all supplement grade testing, more than is needed for the food industry. We filter our oil 4 times before it arrives at your door.
CHEMICAL FREE - Our oil is Hexane free and the convenient packaging is BPA free so you don’t have to worry.
Perfect for high heat cooking up to 350 Farenheit

GIVE BACK - Your purchase will help feed 250 kids three days a week through our Carrington Cares program. These children are a part of the local Philippine community where we source our pure organic coconut oil.

INCREDIBLY VERSATILE - Our coconuts are from the perfect growing climate and produce an oil with a light, clean taste that is perfect for sautéing vegetables, baking or to add to smoothies. Also, Carrington Farms organic pure coconut oil is great for the skin and hair.
